name: Mailmeanote
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mail me a note
des: Sends a short message, consisting of a single sentence (e.g., "buy milk and bread"), to the user's email address. For the skill to work, the user must have given it permission to pick up the email address associated with its Amazon account. The message must not contain pauses or periods and must not be longer than 10 seconds.
